header.title: Shah Fahad
header.subtitle: Full Stack Developer specializing in MERN stack
header.description: I solve tangible problems through the intangible art of coding, framing solutions on the screens of digital devices.

about.title: About Me
description: It all started back in 2021, where I was confused, which major to take. Then suddenly there comes the thought that It would be very cool setting all day on computer among the no IT people. Back then I started to learn about coding and software enviroments. Completing a journey to this point including, developing mutliple software for different clients. Such as Software for Electronic Business, a Ecommerce Startup and my FYP

My main focus these days, include developing fullstack application, using MERN stack. Where I go through all the process of professional software development practices to meet the client requirements.
I mostly spend my time infornt of an emotionless piece of machine called computer. And when I am not using it. I enjoy silently sitting in nature.

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer ·
experience.description: MERN stack developer. Developing fullstack applications including the forntend in React and using Node.js for the backend.

experience.title: WAMP ·
experience.description: Developed an ecommerce web site. Maintained it for a year.

project.title: Solar Scape
project.description: Developed a comprehensive web application for assessing solar potential. Features include user management and an admin dashboard. Implemented a microservices architecture using Node.js. This project is expected to significantly optimize solar energy utilization.

project.title: MIS for Electronic Business
project.description: Engineered a full-stack web application for managing electronic business operations.  Enhanced business efficiency by integrating advanced functionalities like sales and purchase management, demand forecasting, and financial reporting. Implemented using  React, Node.js, and Flask for microservices.

project.title: 3BS . Old Item Market Place
project.description: Developed a marketplace platform using the MERN stack for buying, selling, renting, and bidding on items. Customized user interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS, with backend operations handled by Node.js and media storage through Firebase
